title: Cut Off
writer: Sebastian Fitzek, Michael Tsokos, Christian Alvart
actors: Moritz Bleibtreu, Jasna Fritzi Bauer, Lars Eidinger
plot: Thriller set in the world of Forensic Pathology. Medical examiner Paul Herzfeld finds a capsule in the head of a heavily mutilated corpse, containing a phone number and single word: the name of his daughter.
